backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: removing shoe name text from gallery cards and adding 7 additional shoe images to maintain a 12-item collection.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing a luxury shoe store website with Hero, ShoeGallery (12 images, no names), Reviews, and ContactInfo components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining a luxury-themed color palette with minimal customization.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with a root div and module script reference to main.tsx, titled 'luxury shop'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component composing Hero, ShoeGallery, Reviews, and ContactInfo into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactInfo.tsx: Footer component with phone and WhatsApp contact buttons, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section displaying Hari Traders logo, brand name, and tagline with luxury styling and gold accents.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Customer testimonials section displaying 4 reviews in a grid with profile images, names, 5-star ratings, and review text.
frontend/src/components/ShoeGallery.tsx: Gallery component displaying 12 men's shoe images in a fixed 2-column grid with hover effects, showing only images without product names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend data fetching is required for this static showcase website.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with luxury-themed color palette using OKLCH color space, defining CSS variables for light/dark modes and custom shadow utilities with gold accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with luxury color system, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a men's shoe collection web app with pending feature requests to remove shoe names from cards and add 7 additional product images to the gallery.
